text: The Detroit Cardinals (also known as the Olympians) were an American basketball team based in Detroit, Michigan that was a member of the American Basketball League. The team dropped out of the 1927/28 season on January 3, 1928. ==Year-by-year== {| class="wikitable" !Year !League !Reg. Season !Playoffs |- |1927/28 |ABL |4th, Western |N/A |} Category:Basketball teams in Detroit Category:1927 establishments in Michigan Category:1928 disestablishments in Michigan Category:Basketball teams established in 1927 Category:Sports clubs disestablished in 1928
title: Detroit Cardinals
